Class 1: RHPDS Lab - NGINX Kubernetes Ingress Controller For OpenShift¶

This class has one module and two labs. We’re simply doing this to show the standard structure of a class/module/lab.

Note

It could be simplier to throw all the content in one file but that would miss the point of showing how we curently use RST.
